verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> to הוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <WH1954> that came unto Hosea בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son בְּאֵרִ֔י <WH882> of Beeri בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <WH5818> of Uzziah יוֹתָ֛ם <WH3147> Jotham אָחָ֥ז <WH271> Ahaz יְחִזְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2396> Hezekiah מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִימֵ֛י <WH3117> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> of Joash מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

תְּחִלַּ֥ת <WH8462> The beginning דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> of the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּהוֹשֵׁ֑עַ <WH1954> by Hosea פ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הוֹשֵׁ֗עַ <WH1954> to Hosea לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go קַח־ <WH3947> take לְךָ֞ אֵ֤שֶׁת <WH802> unto thee a wife זְנוּנִים֙ <WH2183> of whoredoms וְיַלְדֵ֣י <WH3206> and children זְנוּנִ֔ים <WH2183> of whoredoms כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זָנֹ֤ה <WH2181> hath committed great תִזְנֶה֙ <WH2181> whoredom הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> for the land מֵֽאַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> [departing] from יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went וַיִּקַּ֔ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> גֹּ֖מֶר <WH1586> Gomer בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter דִּבְלָ֑יִם <WH1691> of Diblaim וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> which conceived וַתֵּֽלֶד־ <WH3205> and bare ל֖וֹ בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> him a son

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> unto קְרָ֥א <WH7121> unto him Call שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name יִזְרְעֶ֑אל <WH3157> Jezreel כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֣וֹד <WH5750> yet מְעַ֗ט <WH4592> for yet a little וּפָ֨קַדְתִּ֜י <WH6485> [while] and I will avenge אֶת־ <WH853> דְּמֵ֤י <WH1818> the blood יִזְרְעֶאל֙ <WH3157> of Jezreel עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> upon the house יֵה֔וּא <WH3058> of Jehu וְהִ֨שְׁבַּתִּ֔י <WH7673> and will cause to cease מַמְלְכ֖וּת <WH4468> the kingdom בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass at that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> I וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <WH7665> that I will break אֶת־ <WH853> קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> in the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> of Jezreel

וַתַּ֤הַר <WH2029> And she conceived again עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בַּ֔ת <WH1323> a daughter וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And [God] said ל֔וֹ קְרָ֥א <WH7121> unto him Call שְׁמָ֖הּ <WH8034> her name לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <WH3819> Loruhamah כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> will no אוֹסִ֜יף <WH3254> for I will no more ע֗וֹד <WH5750> again אֲרַחֵם֙ <WH7355> have mercy אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> would נָשֹׂ֥א <WH5375> but I will utterly אֶשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> take them away לָהֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> upon the house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah אֲרַחֵ֔ם <WH7355> But I will have mercy וְהֽוֹשַׁעְתִּ֖ים <WH3467> and will save בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> them by the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and will not אֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֗ם <WH3467> and will not save בְּקֶ֤שֶׁת <WH7198> them by bow וּבְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> nor by sword וּבְמִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> nor by battle בְּסוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> by horses וּבְפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6571> nor by horsemen
וַתִּגְמֹ֖ל <WH1580> Now when she had weaned אֶת־ <WH853> לֹ֣א רֻחָ֑מָה <WH3819> Loruhamah וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> she conceived וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּֽן׃ <WH1121> a son

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Then said קְרָ֥א <WH7121> [God] Call שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name לֹ֣א עַמִּ֑י <WH3818> Loammi כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> for ye [are] not my people וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶֽם׃ ס

וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become מִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> Yet the number בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel כְּח֣וֹל <WH2344> shall be as the sand הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יִמַּ֖ד <WH4058> which cannot be measured וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִסָּפֵ֑ר <WH5608> nor numbered וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become בִּמְק֞וֹם <WH4725> and it shall come to pass [that] in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Where יֵאָמֵ֤ר <WH559> where it was said לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> unto them Ye [are] not my people אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> It יֵאָמֵ֥ר <WH559> [there] it shall be said לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> to them בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto them [Ye are] the sons אֵֽל־ <WH410> God חָֽי׃ <WH2416> of the living

וְ֠נִקְבְּצוּ <WH6908> be gathered בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Then shall the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> together וְשָׂמ֥וּ <WH7760> and appoint לָהֶ֛ם רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> head אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> themselves one וְעָל֣וּ <WH5927> and they shall come up מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> out of the land כִּ֥י <WH3588> For גָד֖וֹל <WH1419> for great י֥וֹם <WH3117> [shall be] the day יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> of Jezreel
